title: Sport (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I.
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Merchant Shipping (Fees) (Load
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Merchant Shipping (Fees) (Load 

Lines) Regulations 2025.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited merchant shipping (fees) (load lines) regulation 2025

title: Sport (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I.
heading: 2. Schedule 2 to the Merchant Shipping (Fees) Regulations 2010 (S.I. No.
text_raw:
2. Schedule 2 to the Merchant Shipping (Fees) Regulations 2010 (S.I. No. 

595 of 2010) is amended by substituting for Part 1 the following: 

“Part 1 

Load line surveys and inspections – Prescribed fees
text_norm: 2 schedule 2 merchant shipping (fees) regulation 2010 (s.i no 595 2010) amended substituting part 1 following part 1 load line survey inspection - prescribed fee

title: Sport (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I.
heading: 1. The fees prescribed as payable in respect of each survey or inspection
text_raw:
1. The fees prescribed as payable in respect of each survey or inspection 
mentioned in Chapters A, B and C of this Part shall be determined by the amount 
of work involved, charged at an hourly rate of €72.
text_norm: 1 fee prescribed payable respect survey inspection mentioned chapter b c part shall determined amount work involved charged hourly rate eur72

title: Sport (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I.
heading: 2. Notwithstanding paragraph 1, the fees prescribed as payable in respect
text_raw:
2. Notwithstanding paragraph 1, the fees prescribed as payable in respect 
of each survey or inspection mentioned in Chapters A, B and C shall not exceed 
the maximum amounts prescribed in those Chapters.
text_norm: 2 notwithstanding paragraph 1 fee prescribed payable respect survey inspection mentioned chapter b c shall exceed maximum amount prescribed chapter

title: Sport (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I.
heading: 3. References in Chapters B or C to a standard fee are references to the fee
text_raw:
3. References in Chapters B or C to a standard fee are references to the fee 

set out in Chapter A appropriate to the tonnage of the ship concerned. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 26th September, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [434] 3 

Chapter A
text_norm: 3 reference chapter b c standard fee reference fee set chapter appropriate tonnage ship concerned notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 26th september 2025 434 3 chapter

title: Sport (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I.
heading: In respect of a survey of a sister ship for stability requirements the fee
text_raw:
7. 

In respect of a survey of a sister ship for stability requirements the fee 
prescribed as payable shall be 20 per cent of the appropriate fee specified in the 
Table at paragraph 6 for the first ship of the same type. 

Chapter C 

Fees for Survey and Inspection Special Cases
text_norm: 7 respect survey sister ship stability requirement fee prescribed payable shall 20 per cent appropriate fee specified table paragraph 6 first ship type chapter c fee survey inspection special case

title: Sport (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I.
heading: 10. A fee of €172 is prescribed as payable in respect of the issue, in
text_raw:
10. A fee of €172 is prescribed as payable in respect of the issue, in 
substitution for an existing load line certificate, or load line exemption 
certificate, of a corresponding certificate showing amended or extended plying 
limits (including such survey or inspection as may be necessary).
text_norm: 10 fee eur172 prescribed payable respect issue substitution existing load line certificate load line exemption certificate corresponding certificate showing amended extended plying limit (including survey inspection may necessary)

title: Sport (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I.
heading: 11. A fee of €86 is prescribed as payable in respect of the endorsement of a
text_raw:
11. A fee of €86 is prescribed as payable in respect of the endorsement of a 

load line exemption certificate.”. 

 
 
 
 
 
 The Minister for Public Expenditure, Infrastructure, Public Service Reform and 
Digitalisation consents to the making of the foregoing Regulations. 

[434] 7 

GIVEN under my Official Seal of the Minister for Public 
Expenditure, Infrastructure, Public Service Reform and 
Digitalisation, 

23 September, 2025. 

JACK CHAMBERS, 

Minister for Public Expenditure, Infrastructure, Public 
Service Reform and Digitalisation. 

GIVEN under my hand, 
 16 September 2025 

SEÁN CANNEY, 
 Minister of State at the Department of Transport

title: Sport (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I.
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Merchant Shipping (Fees) 
Regulations 2010 (S.I. No. 595 of 2010), to highlight the maximum fees payable 
for load line surveys and certificates. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [434] 9
